ESIC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 243 Teaching Faculty Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 25, 2025, 16:41 IST
 Employees State Insurance Corporation Limited
 243 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Jul-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 67,700 to 208,700




FOLLOW

The Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) has declared the official notification for 2025. Allotted 243 Vacancies for the Teaching Faculty (Assistant Professor) Jobs.. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/MS, DNB, MDS, Post Graduation, DNB, Ph.D can utilize this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the ESIC Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible aspirants can fill out the application form on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi

ESIC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Teaching Faculty (Assistant Professor) 	243	MD/MS, DNB, MDS, Post Graduation, DNB, Ph.D

Age Limit for the ESIC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Age Relaxation

OBC Candidates: 03 Years
SC/ST Candidates: 05 Years
PwBD (UR) Candidates: 10 Years
PwBD (OBC) Candidates: 13 Years
PwBD (SC/ST) Candidates: 15 Years

Selection Process for the ESIC Recruitment 2025

Written Test
Interview

Salary Structure for the ESIC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 67,700 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 2,08,700 /- per month.

Application fee for the ESIC Recruitment 2025

Female/SC/ST/PwBD/ESIC Employee Candidates: Nil
All Other Candidates: Rs. 500/-
Mode of Payment: Demand Draft/Banker’s Cheque
How to Apply for the ESIC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or Career Page.
Check for the Teaching Faculty notification 2025.
Read the Notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Pay the application fee through a Demand Draft.
Then, send the application form along with the required documents to the address given below.

Address

Regional Director, ESI Corporation, Panchdeep Bhawan, Sector-16, (Near Laxmi Narayan Mandir), Faridabad-121002, Haryana

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	24-07-2025
Last Date of Application	15-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
